description: GDC Rucksack. The compact R-103 is designed to hold a Digital / SLR body with up to 300mm lens attached, an extra body, 4-5 lenses or a mini DV camcorder. Additional accessories, like flash-unit, filters, charger, cables and personal essentials can be stored in the spacious arched lid compartment, the 2 outside pockets and the central mesh/vinyl pocket. The R-103's ergonomic harness includes a unique cushioning and shock absorbing system, which allows for optimal ventilation, weight distribution and 5-point adjustment mechanism.  The R-103 includes a well-padded dividing set, which allows you to organize it to fit your requirements, and two detachable mesh pouches. If needed, extra Modi-Vers Kit is available. Features    Comfortable backpack can accommodate SLR with attached 300mm lens or large DV camcorder. Two outside pockets, two detachable interior mesh pockets, and a laptop compartment. Main compartment stores the camera in the center; quick draw via small top opening flap. Exterior made of highly durable, waterproof TST (Thermo Shield Technology)     Padded shoulder strap, detachable hip belt
title: Kata R-103 GDC Rucksack
